title: Roadmap
subtitle: Timeline and Milestones
heading: Key milestones of the project implementation
description: The DogWalkerToken project is implemented in stages, according to the approach: planning – building – testing – expansion. Each step has a clearly defined goal: to increase usability, community engagement and token value

phases.label: Phase 1: Planning and Market Research (Q1 2025)
items: Pet Services Market Analysis
Consultation with dog owners, caregivers, investors
Preparation of tokenomics, staking strategy and referral model
Technology selection (BSC) and application architecture design
phases.goal: Create solid foundations for concept and tokenization

phases.label: Stage 2: Public ICO and presale (Q2 2025)
items: Start of the first round of ICO at a price of $0.01 per DWT
Launch of a marketing campaign (social media, influencers, articles)
Referral system (5%) and whitelists
Airdrops and early staking with APR 20% for first users
phases.goal: Start financing the project and build an active community
